Body: I am trying to store a .csv file from a cloud database to a local pc but i want this work to be done automatically by a visual studio application. Help me . Thanks alot guys

Sounds like you need to learn how to write a suitable program or to identify an existing one you can use.  **Likely you should do a web search for relevant examples.**  This question is either too broad to belong here, or a request for help in finding off-site resources, which is a prohibited type of question.
